descriptionHTML:
Tipsy for WatchMaker

WatchMaker required http://goo.gl/FMxUfY

Tipsy is a simple and quick to view watch face for use with WatchMaker.

Tipsy includes:

• Bold 12h digital clock
• Date
• Day of the week
• Watch battery indicator
• Bold ambient digital clock for quick and easy viewing in all lighting conditions
• *Cool new animated effects*
• Great battery life (tested with the Moto360)
• Works with Square and Round watches
